code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ChatUI(){const[messages,setMessages]=useState([]);const[input,setInput]=useState('');const handleSend=()=>{setMessages([...messages,input]);setInput('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:messages.map((message,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:input,onChange:e=>setInput(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSend,children:"Send"})]});}export default ChatUI;
